title: Design of novel potent selective survivin inhibitors using 2D-QSAR modeling, molecular docking, molecular dynamics, and ADMET properties of new MX-106 hydroxyquinoline scaffold derivatives
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Mourad Aloui, Mohamed El fadili, Somdutt Mujwar, Sara Er-rahmani, Hatem A. Abuelizz, Mohammed Er-rajy, Sara Zarougui, Menana Elhallaoui
